generatePortal.tailIncludes: --TAIL-INCLUDES-PLACEHOLDER--<script defer src='--BASE-URL-PLACEHOLDER--/static/guided-walkthrough-scripts/CreateProductCatalog.js'></script><script defer src='--BASE-URL-PLACEHOLDER--/static/guided-walkthrough-scripts/ManageBillingPortal.js'></script></script><script defer src='--BASE-URL-PLACEHOLDER--/static/guided-walkthrough-scripts/SubscriptionManagement.js'></script><script>document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) => {APIMaticDevPortal.ready(({ registerWorkflow }) => {registerWorkflow('page:walkthroughs/product-catalog/walkthrough-1', 'Product Catalog Walkthrough', ProductCatalog); registerWorkflow( 'page:walkthroughs/manage-billing-portal/walkthrough-1', 'Billing Portal Management Walkthrough',ManageBillingPortal); registerWorkflow( 'page:walkthroughs/subscription-management/walkthrough-1', 'Subscription Management Walkthrough',SubscriptionManagment); });});</script>
